actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to marine sanitation devices.

summary.text: Permits States or their political subdivisions to regulate the design, manufacture, installation, or use of marine sanitation devices, provided that such regulations are not less strigent than Federal regulations promulgated under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to marine sanitation devices.
